title: Blood The Last Vampire [720p][F-R]
description:
Here's Blood: The Last Vampire.
This is the 2000 anime movie, not the 2009 live-action one. 

Audio: English & Japanese
There's only one track. Part of it's Japanese, part is English.
That's how this movie was made, as described at http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=anime&aid=43
Subtitles: English for the Japanese parts.

Technical Stuff:
Source: Blu-Ray
Video: x264 crf17
Resolution: 1332x720 (1.85:1)
Audio: English & Japanese 6ch AAC
Subtitles: .ASS English, BDSUP English
